content: pretty socks knit top-down in the round with mirrored cables work up quickly in worsted weight yarn at 6 st/inch you could also use a sport/dk if you can get that gauge with them i use these as slippers they are quick to knit and comfortable to wear **january 2015 ** kal in my group 1 with added instruction for working these on two circulars **january 2015 ** changed the initial cable to add some increases as people were finding them a bit snug there added definition for pfb and changed counts for both sizes 1 http //www ravelry com/discuss/muggins-magic-hang-out/topics/3108225
